thread.title: Azerbaijan hit by strong earthquake

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Azerbaijan hit by strong earthquake
text:
Azerbaijan hit by strong earthquake   
Sep 04, 2015 eTN   
A 5.4 earthquake hit 15km SSE of Oguz, Azerbaijan on Friday at 9.49 am (UTC/GMT +5 hours) local time 
It hit Azerbaijan’s Ujar, Mingachevir, Yevlakh and Ganja regions, residents of Yevlakh and Ganja 
Reportedly, the earthquake was felt in the abovementioned regions. 
The earthquake measured 7 on Richter scale in the epicenter. The depth of the earthquake focus was 13 kilometers, while the magnitude reached 5.9. 
Meanwhile, another earthquake hit the border cities of Azerbaijan and Iran Sept. 4 morning. 
The quake hit the cities of Parsabad, Bileh Savar and Germi in the Ardabil Province of Iran near the country’s border with Azerbaijan. The quake, measured 5 points on the Richter scale in its epicenter and about 4 points in the residential areas nearby. 
Currently no information is available about destruction or injuries.
